categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a battle was fought in the honey fields of Vir Aphshire between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry. The news of Alderaan's destruction was given without hesitation by the 61st's Captain, Micha Evon.

Near the end of the battle, the 61st got news of the destruction of the Death Star, and it boosted morale. The 61st defeated the Imperial forces that day, but the stormtroopers destroyed the hives to minimize looting from the rebels.

Afterwards, Sergeant Fektrin had a relatively new soldier, Private Hazram Namir, give the report to the Captain saying everyone would need to meet him eventually. Namir met Evon and was moved by his speech on the 61st.
